Bring Your Bible to School Day: is an annual event organized by Focus on the Family, a Christian conservative group. It was first held in 2014 and will take place on 4 October in 2018.
The event is not created by President Do: and it is not sponsored or sanctioned by the federal government.
Participation in the event is voluntary: directed, meaning it is up to students, Christian clubs, and youth groups to sign up online and lead the activities in their school.
The Alliance Defending Freedom: another conservative Christian non-profit organization, provides legal consultation for students involved in the initiative.
